vla

Variable-Length Aggregates (Structs). See also: https://gcc.gnu.org/onlinedocs/gcc/Zero-Length.html

@trusted T* constructVariableLength(T, Args...)(size_t requiredCapacity, Args args) if (is(T == struct) || is(T == class));
Construct an instance of a variable-length aggregate (
struct
) type 
T
. Construction is done using 
malloc
plus 
emplace
.

enum auto hasVariableLength(T);
Check if type 
T
is a variable-length aggregate (
struct
) type.
